issues.description: The problem statement specifies a method named checkOrderReady() for serving orders, but the solution implementation provides this functionality in a method called processOrders(), causing a mismatch in method naming for the same conceptual operation.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solutionâ€™s processOrders() method to checkOrderReady() (and update its invocations) so it matches the name described in the problem statement and UML diagram.
